Title: Silja - nuorena nukkunut
Actors: Heidi Krohn, Jussi Jurkka, Aku Korhonen
Plot: In the 1910s, beautiful young Silja loses both parents and ends up working as a maid at wealthier farms around her village. She is courted by a number of bachelors, ranging from simple farmhand Väinö to sophisticated young student...
